title.rendered: Tastebudz Purple Kush Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🍇 Purple Kush Strain – Autoflowering Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

A Classic Kush Reborn with Autoflowering Ease

The legendary purple kush strain gets a modern twist with Tastebudz Syndicate’ autoflowering version — a fast-finishing, terp-rich hybrid bred from Blackberry Kush and Purple Punch Auto. This indica-dominant autoflower is a flavour bomb wrapped in calming, full-body effects.

With 22% THC, vibrant purple hues, and a deliciously fruity aroma, Purple Kush is ideal for those seeking a smooth evening strain or a reliable, compact plant to add to their collection. Whether you’re after chill vibes or standout genetics, this strain doesn’t disappoint.

Curious about the original photoperiod version? Explore Purple Kush Feminised here →

All seeds sold are adult souvenirs only. Cultivation or germination of cannabis seeds is prohibited in the UK without a license.

📊 Purple Kush Auto Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Blackberry Kush x Purple Punch Auto
Strain Type Indica-Dominant Autoflower
Flowering Time 8–10 Weeks
Indoor Yield Up to 500g/m²
THC Content Up to 22%
Flavours Blackberry, purple grape, tropical fruits
Aromas Fruity, earthy, candy-sweet
Effects Relaxing, calming, long-lasting

🌟 What Makes Purple Kush a Top Choice?

  • Classic Flavours, Modern Speed – Sweet berry meets smooth earthy Kush in a fast-growing autoflower
  • Compact and Resilient – Perfect for tight spaces and stress-free grows
  • Purple Appeal – Visually striking buds coated in trichomes and dark purple hues
  • Balanced Indica Effects – Deep calm, gentle euphoria, and physical ease
  • Quick Finish – Just 8–10 weeks from seed to harvest

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Purple Kush Strain

1. What is the Purple Kush strain?
Purple Kush is a well-loved indica strain known for its rich berry flavour, relaxing effects, and deep purple colouring. The autoflowering version offers the same traits with a quicker finish and easier grow process.

2. Is Purple Kush Auto good for beginners?
Yes! Its autoflowering genetics make it easy to grow without light cycle changes, and its compact size suits indoor spaces.

3. What are the effects of Purple Kush Auto?
Expect long-lasting, calming effects perfect for evenings, stress relief, or winding down without feeling overly sedated.

4. How long does Purple Kush Auto take to flower?
It finishes in just 8–10 weeks from seed, making it one of the quicker autos in the Tastebudz collection.

5. What does the purple kush strain taste like?
Think juicy blackberries, purple grape, and sweet tropical notes layered over earthy Kush tones — smooth and satisfying.

🛒 Experience the Best of Purple with This Autoflowering Kush

Whether you’re a connoisseur of classic indicas or new to collecting, the purple kush strain in its autoflowering form offers the perfect mix of flavour, ease, and beauty. Reliable, compact, and terp-rich — this one’s a no-brainer for flavour chasers and calm seekers alike.

🍇 Why Tastebudz Purple Kush Auto Strain Seeds?

Experience deep relaxation with Tastebudz Purple Kush Auto. A mostly Indica strain with genetics from Blackberry Kush and Purple Punch Auto, this potent flower delivers 22% THC and yields up to 500g/m² in just 8-10 weeks. Enjoy the rich flavours of blackberries, purple grape, and exotic fruits while the powerful, long-lasting effects melt away stress and tension.
